global_style.style: Render a modern graphic narrative grounded in clarity, consequence, and production-grade realism. The visual style is clean and minimal—focused not on server rooms or racks, but on the humans diagnosing uptime in the systems that matter. Interfaces are dark-mode, dashboards muted, telemetry is visualized with intention. The world is not high drama; it’s quiet tension—laptops open, dashboards glowing, eyes scanning for truth beneath the noise. Characters appear in tech-forward settings: reliability war rooms, digital operations suites, observability-first product teams. No flashy gimmicks. Just smart people fighting complex systems—with data, with judgment, and with just enough sarcasm to survive.
global_style.line_style: Clean, medium-weight lines. Semi-realistic proportions with expressive facial and body language.
palette: Primary Colors: Charcoal Black (#1C1C1E), Rust Red (#8B2E2E), Slate Gray (#3E4A59). Supporting: Ash Gray (#B0B4B9), Muted Olive (#586E4B), Off-White (#EDEDED). Highlights: Deep Amber (#C97E38), System Blue (#3478F6).
global_style.atmosphere: Minimalist but rich: dark telemetry, clean light, digital, high-stakes. A modern workspace designed for clarity: dark dashboards, isolated lighting, filtered daylight (if visible), and wall-mounted screens with muted telemetry. The tone is quiet vigilance. Systems hum; tension builds in the questions no one wants to ask out loud.
global_style.eye_detail: eyes must be fully illustrated with visible irises and reflection; never black dots or cartoon ovals. Eyes must reflect character emotion—focus, concern, skepticism, curiosity—as appropriate to the scene.

layout_rules.speech_bubble_font: clean lettering. Do hyphenate words at the end of lines.
